WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I have the folowing array in column A on a worksheet named "text":
"one"
"two"
"three"
 
When I have the following calculation on the same worksheet, it works:
=INDEX(A:A, 1)
 
When I have the calculation on another worksheet:
=INDEX(text!A:A, 1) fails where
=INDEX(text!A1:A3, 1) works fine.
 
When I name the column, eg. "TextNumbers", then the following also works:
=INDEX(TextNumbers, 1)
 
The "text!A:A" notation is only a problem for reading Excel2007. In earlier Excel the internal notation for "A:A" seems to be "A$1:A$65536".
WorkItem.Summary: Excel2007: full column reference in calculation not working when column is on another worksheet
